name: Beatshot (Aren)
description:
You are stuck in the endless music loop.

The only way to escape here is to beat that giant boss.

You can't do it alone. The boss is too strong but time is limited.

But what if you could do it with yourself from the previous loop?

Be careful. You could kill yourself, or be killed by yourself.

WASD to move, Mouse to aim, LMB to shoot.

The red bar shows the health of the boss, The blue bar shows the time remaining until the next loop.

Music by

Wizwars - 8 Bit Raceway (Title)

Level 1: Kubbi - Ember (Level 1)
